fn.p: Edited by Adolfo Garcia-Sastre, Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, New York, NY, and approved March 25, 2020 (received for review November 4, 2019)

Author contributions: A.S., D.V., and E.E.O. designed research; A.S., E.S.G., H.C.T., M.M.C., T.S., and C.C. performed research; H.C.T. provided cells and technical expertise; S.G.V. contributed new reagents/analytic tools; A.S., D.V., and E.E.O. analyzed data; and A.S. and E.E.O. wrote the paper.
